title: Wizard Storm (2U48)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Spell. Weather. To play, exert an [Isengard] minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. When the fellowship moves from this site, every companion must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.
Lore:	“There was a black look in the sky, and the sun was wan. The wind had gone now round to the north-east.”
Rarity:	U
